aboutme: I’m a developer who likes building projects, learning new technologies, and figuring things out by actually creating things. I started this space to share what I’m learning, document my progress, and give myself something more productive to do than doom scrolling.

projects.title: HandyVision
projects.summary: Integrated OpenCV with a Flask backend to serve real-time webcam feed to a responsive frontend, demonstrating full-stack development with computer vision capabilities.

projects.title: SymptoQuest
projects.summary: SymptoQuest is a web application that provides accurate medical diagnosis based on user input symptoms

projects.title: Tuffy Reminder
projects.summary: IOS task manager app that lets users create task, set a due date, and time their work, improving effiency
